title: For A Successful Future, Ford Looks To Court Teens, Car-Sharers
teaser: Melissa Block talks to Sheryl Connelly, manager of global trends and "futuring" for the Ford Motor Company, from the Detroit Auto Show about the outlook for the auto industry and what consumers can expect in the coming years.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
